DOC.brief_title: Surgery Plus Single Agent Chemotherapy Versus Primary Chemotherapy for Gestational Trophoblastic Neoplasms
DOC.detailed_description: Gestational trophoblastic neoplasm affect women and is sensitive to chemotherapy espechialy methotrexate and the investigators try to find a role of surgery plus mehotrexate instead of multiple doses and cycles of chemotherapy that affect the patient quality of life and complication related to both line of management and time of decrease of B-hcg.
DOC.criteria: females 40 years or more plateau or rising B hCG titre without distant metastasis WHO score is less than 7 less than 40 years distant metastasis to lung and liver chronic medical diseases WHO score is more than 7
